Resume.address: 156/Khor Village No.6, Bang Pla Kot, Pa Mok, Ang Thong, 14130
Resume.objectives: A motivated fresh graduate with a strong interest in web application and backend development. Experienced in building web systems using TypeScript, Node.js, and Databases, with hands-on experience in modern development tools and workflows. Seeking a Web Developer role with strong motivation, adaptability, and eagerness to continuously learn new skills, while contributing to the development of maintainable, efficient, and scalable systems. A proactive team player who enjoys problem-solving, supporting teammates, and continuously improving technical skills.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Deployed a Linux server using Rocky Linux 9 on Linode cloud platform to host web applications.
Configured services including DNS server, Apache web server, MySQL database, and SSH for remote access.

responsibilities: Provided technical support to end-users, resolving hardware and software issues.
Assisted in setting up, configuring, and maintaining workstations, printers, and network equipment.

Designed a modular Frontend-Backend architecture integrating Google Forms, Google Sheets, and Encore.ts for automated scheduling and API services.

activities.topic: Practical Training: "Development of Email Servers to Support Thai Language Emails (EAI)" by THNIC
details: Participated in an intensive hands-on workshop conducted by THNIC aimed at equipping participants with the skills to develop email servers capable of supporting Thai language emails (EAI).
Successfully configured and deployed personal email servers using Ubuntu operating system, enabling practical experience in server setup and administration.

SEAKEEN.schedule_description: Upcoming and past events related to SEAKEEN.

About.main: **Ottric** comes from the combination of __otter__ and __apricot crayfish__. The name represents playfulness, warmth, and a unique identity inspired by SEAKEEN and Nong Nooong — reflecting the beautiful bond between artists and their fans that defines our brand.
About.sub:
At Ottric, we believe in stylish simplicity, and thoughtful details that spark smiles.
**Ottric is where creativity meets charm — naturally playful, uniquely bright.**
